rules.description: Change left_shift to caps_lock if pressed alone (All profile)
Change caps_lock to left_control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone (All profile)
Change shift + delete to forward delete (All profile)
Change left_shift to caps_lock if pressed alone (None profile)
Change caps_lock to left_control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone (None profile)
Change shift + delete to forward delete (None profile)
